scripts.bundle-zip: rm -rf build && yarn create-build-folder && yarn bundle && yarn zip
scripts.bundle-all: rm -rf build && yarn create-build-folder && yarn bundle
scripts.bundle-ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output build/ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest build/ios/
scripts.bundle-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output build/android/main.jsbundle --assets-dest build/android/
scripts.create-build-folder: mkdir -p build/android && mkdir -p build/ios && mkdir -p build/zip
scripts.codepush-android-staging: appcenter codepush release-react -a Demo-MiniAppView/Test-01-Android -b main.jsbundle -d Staging
